title: It's a night-time shorts, Not Cargo shorts
body: The material is too thin and it will easily get torn if you use it for playing games like football or cricket. On a bright sunny day, it's almost a see-through material. It can be best used for night-time wear. Not deserve to be called as a Cargo shorts.
